meanings.definition: A semiconductor device with two terminals, typically allowing the flow of current in one direction only.
meanings.sent1: The diode in the circuit ensures electricity flows in just one direction.
meanings.sent2: I used a diode to make sure the current only went one way.
meanings.sent3: The diode was like a traffic cop, letting current pass in one direction only.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a diode, filtering out negative thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The diode acted as a gatekeeper, permitting current to pass in a single direction.

meanings.definition: A device that allows electricity to flow in one direction only.
meanings.sent1: Make sure to connect the diode correctly so the electricity flows in the right way.
meanings.sent2: The diode prevented the current from flowing back.
meanings.sent3: The diode was like a one-way street for electricity.
meanings.sent4: His decision-making process was as strict as a diode, allowing only one path.
meanings.sent5: The diode acted as a bouncer, permitting only authorized electricity to enter.
